main_definition: The feeling of fulfillment or contentment when desires, needs, or expectations are met.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Feeling pleased with the outcome of a situation or experience
meanings_and_examples.example: After completing her first marathon, she felt immense satisfaction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The sense of happiness derived from fulfilling a personal desire or goal
meanings_and_examples.example: He got great satisfaction from fixing the old car he had been working on for years.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Contentment resulting from having one's needs and desires met
meanings_and_examples.example: The new job brought her a deep sense of satisfaction as it allowed her to meet both her financial and personal goals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The state of being content with the performance or result of an action taken
meanings_and_examples.example: His boss was satisfied with the report he submitted, praising its thoroughness and accuracy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A measure of how well a product meets customer expectations and desires
meanings_and_examples.example: The company measures customer satisfaction to gauge the success of their products and services.
